alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 4:45AM AKDT until March 19 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Blowing snow and drifting snow. Winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...Over Summits of the Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds gusting to 40 mph are occuring over summits such as Finger Mountain and are causing blowing and drifting snow. The winds will decrease this later this morning conditions will improve then.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
